import React from "react"; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { CurrentUser } from "./context"; export default function NavBar({}){ const { currentUser } = React.useContext(CurrentUser); const location = useLocation(); const { pathname } = location; let selected = `#${pathname}` return (
  • Deposit
  • Withdraw
  • Transfer
  • All Data
  • {currentUser.email}
); }
